NORTH AND SOUTH AMERICA TOUR

Atakama Desert

Zhangjiajie is in the northwestern part of the hunan province of central china.The main draw is the wulingyuan scenic area, which was added to the UNESCO World Heritage list.

  • OPEN:Full Week, 8:00 AM - 6:00PM
  • REQUIRED: 10 year China VISA for foreign tourists.
  • PRICE:$475/day
